website_summaries.verdict: This action-packed, highly detailed 1,000-piece set is filled with awesome features that are bound to please.
pros: Team with Spider-Man and his web friends to defeat Green Goblin and other arch enemies on a New York bridge
Press the flag to launch a net to trap villains
Lots of cool features, including trap doors and a secret lair
cons: Expensive and may be too complicated for younger fans

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my son for Christmas. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for Christmas. It is February 20th and the set is still together. I am currently eavesdropping on my children as they participate in a very serious situation involving batman, some kind of skeleton creature and bunny scissor laser beams. All of this is based on a scenario which is has to do with the bridge. Typically Lego sets are built, dismantled and the Legos are then added to are immense collection. This set however has become a staple to imaginary play. It certainly deserves at least 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ThreadShredder

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good set!
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for my 7 year old for Christmas. Lego does a pretty good job identifying what age group can build what, and this was no different. This says at least 8 and it was definitely too much for my 7 year old, who is a veteran lego builder. I had to build most of it for him, but all in all it was a great set
customer_reviews.author: Seth W

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Set at an Amazing Price
customer_reviews.text: An amazing set. I had so much fun putting this one together. The setting is great, the characters are great, and the play value is amazing. There is so much to do. I'm really surprised with this sets price. Sometimes Lego can nail it out of the park with their price per piece and others don't make any sense. This set for $100 is already a good deal and it's even better since you can get it on Amazon for $80 right now. This set is great to look at and fun to setup.
customer_reviews.author: ScoutMasterJ

customer_reviews.title: Fun to build and fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: Fun to build and sturdy. Lots of moving parts that make it fun to play with once built.
customer_reviews.author: Dori

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego Set for Spiderman Fans
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year-old grandson, like his father (my son), loves Legos. He received the Super Heroes Spiderman bridge for Christmas. With only minimal assistance from his dad, my grandson worked methodically through the bags of pieces to totally assemble this kit over the course of 3 days. It is recommended for ages 8--14, but for younger children who love a challenge, love Legos, and love Spiderman, this is a great set!
customer_reviews.author: LighthousesLover

customer_reviews.title: Fun set, but a few pieces constantly fall off.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set that my son enjoys a lot to play with. However there are certain pieces that are on the outside that do not seem to stay on at all. Made me think of the lego movie about someone using glue to keep it together (not that I would).
customer_reviews.author: StevenJones

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars!  Thank you Amazon!

In fact, i wanted to get a few more of this so that i could build a complete bridge.

customer_reviews.title: I love the concept for this
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept for this. It looks cool and it's Spiderman. It appeared it would have great playability after it was set up. Unfortunately we've given up on this for now, since it constantly fell apart. We built the "road" of the bridge, but there are several pieces that are only held together by one dot - not great for keeping everything together! The bases for the bridge are also connected to the road in a flimsy way, so until we have time to try to figure out how to make it more solid, it lays in pieces. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Best spiderman lego set ever
customer_reviews.text: Tons of unique minifigures. I did end up buying two of these to make one complete bridge. Best spiderman lego set ever.
customer_reviews.author: TheYellowKing

product_meta.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes Spider-Man: Web Warriors Ultimate Bridge 76057 Spiderman Toy
product_meta.description:
The bridge is under attack! Team up Spider-Man, Spider-Girl and Scarlet Spider to defeat Green Goblin. But beware Kraven the Hunter crawling out of his secret lair, and watch out for Scorpion's venomous tail. Rescue the taxi with a web before it plunges off the roadway, and protect Aunt May from Green Goblin's flaming pumpkin bomb-then round up all the villains in a web prison. A true action-packed Spider-Man toy!

BRAND STORY
By LEGO Super Heroes
feature_bullets: Build the ultimate battle on a New York City bridge between Spider Man’s team of web slinging heroes and some of his most sinister foes
Bridge features a movable roadway and detachable suspension cables, secret trap door, Spidey’s web prison, Kraven the Hunter’s secret lair, smash-apart signposts, and more
Includes mini figures of Spider-Man, Spider-Girl, Scarlet Spider, Aunt May, Scorpion, Kraven the Hunter, and Green Goblin with buildable Goblin Glider, plus webs and other accessories
LEGO Marvel Super Heroes building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Bridge is over 12 inch high, 5 inch wide, and 17 inch deep. Goblin Glider is under 1 inch high and over 2 inch long and 3 inch wide
1,092 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 8 and 14 years old

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars153 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
